roleset.name: abnormality in absorption of nutrients
roleset.note: MALABSORPTION-N NOTES: Relation to verb-absorb.01. (from malabsorption.01-n)
MALABSORPTION-N NOTES: Verbal counterpart not expected to be grammatical, or to occur.

role.descr: Sponge into which Arg1 is absorbed, if in addition to arg0

example.name: malabsorption-n
example.text: This impedes his body's ability to repair the lining of the GI tract, which serves only to exacerbate his malabsorption of nutrients.
